description.displayText: Tatyanne currently works for us, and we love her. She helps our daughter get ready for school and drives her to school everyday. She is on-time and reliable. Our daughter loves her and asks for Tatyanne and wants to call her and talk to her on the phone when she's not around. Tatyanne asks questions to ensure she is meeting your expectations, and she sends photos and texts to let me know how things are going - often of the two of them singing in the car together.
description.originalText: Tatyanne currently works for us, and we love her. She helps our daughter get ready for school and drives her to school everyday. She is on-time and reliable. Our daughter loves her and asks for Tatyanne and wants to call her and talk to her on the phone when she's not around. Tatyanne asks questions to ensure she is meeting your expectations, and she sends photos and texts to let me know how things are going - often of the two of them singing in the car together.

description.displayText: We live in Connecticut and needed a babysitter for our twins in New York City for a night in a hotel. Tatyanne helped us. She was great with our 1 year old twins. She stayed as long as we needed her to. She fed them and put them in bed. She periodically texted us to let us know how they were doing. I wish she lived in CT so that we could have hired her full time.
description.originalText: We live in Connecticut and needed a babysitter for our twins in New York City for a night in a hotel. Tatyanne helped us. She was great with our 1 year old twins. She stayed as long as we needed her to. She fed them and put them in bed. She periodically texted us to let us know how they were doing. I wish she lived in CT so that we could have hired her full time.

description.displayText: Tatyanne provided care for my three children, ages 6, 3, and 2, as needed, for about 1 year, until she relocated to New York. I would hire her again without a doubt. She is mature, reliable, caring, calm, and is highly skilled at maintaining order with several small children! She is very conscientious-- making sure to encourage healthy meals and snacks, changing diapers very thoroughly and frequently, keeping the house tidy, and initiating educational and imaginative play rather than screen time. My children really liked her, and I always felt they were with someone who truly cared for their well-being! Additionally, Tatyanne was very good about responding to my messages promptly and communicating regularly about our plans.

description.displayText: Interviewed with Tatyanne.  Only reason we did not hire her is that our work schedules weren't meshing very well.  She was a great caregiver and has excellent communication skills.  Would definitely use her for date nights, etc., if we ever need it in the future.
description.originalText: Interviewed with Tatyanne.  Only reason we did not hire her is that our work schedules weren't meshing very well.  She was a great caregiver and has excellent communication skills.  Would definitely use her for date nights, etc., if we ever need it in the future.

description.displayText: Tatyanne is very organized and maintains excellent communication on her schedule with us. She is very responsible, jumping right in to maintain a calm but playful routine with our 3 young busy boys while we are away!
